name: Aesop
detail: After all is said and done, more is said than done.

name: Aristotle
detail: Wit is educated insolence.

name: Aristotle
detail: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.

name: Sir Francis Bacon
detail: Knowledge is power.

name: Honore de Balzac
detail: Behind every great fortune there is a crime.

name: Orlando A; Battisa
detail: An error doesn't become a mistake until you refuse to correct it.

name: Ingrid Bergman
detail: Happiness lies in good health and a bad memory.

name: Napoleon Bonaparte
detail: Ability is nothing without opportunity.

name: Napoleon Bonaparte
detail: Glory is fleeting but obscurity is forever.

name: Miguel de Cervantes
detail: Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.

name: Coco Chanel
detail: There are people who have money and people who are rich.

name: G.K. Chesterton
detail: Don't ever take a fence down until you know the reason it was put up.

name: Winston Churchill
detail: We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give.

name: Winston Churchill
detail: If you are going through hell, keep going.

name: Winston Churchill
detail: The price of greatness is responsibility.

name: Conficius
detail: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.

name: Conficius
detail: Respect yourself and others will respect you.

name: Benjamin Disraeli
detail: Talk to a man about himself and he will listen for hours.

name: Benjamin Disraeli
detail: The secret of success is constancy of purpose.

name: Alexandre Dumas
detail: All for one and one for all.
